title: HELP! Constantly Disconnecting From PVP.net
body: Every ten or so seconds my client will disconnect from PVP.net and occasionally the client will crash completely. I have no issues whatsoever if I do happen to make it into a game, which is rare. I've had this issue for a few months now & I've tried disabling IP Helper, repairing client, disabling Firewall, etc. & it has gotten to the point where I can't play games at all because it is becoming progressively worse. Does anybody have a solution?

replies.body:
Hi,

What ISP are you with? Are you still having the problem?

We did hear of some potential ISP issues last night for some players, but they should be resolved now.

Cheers
Mindstar
Hi, thank you for responding! My ISP is Telstra and I am still having the same issue, although it varies in severity depending on the day.

Hey Sapphire,

You mentioned a couple of the steps you have taken so far - check over [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure you have tried all of them.

If have already tried these steps though, I think it might be a good idea to get in touch with our support team, who will be able to help you find the root cause.

Mindstar
